segments.text: What kinds of meat are most popular in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We usually eat chicken , pork and beef . You eat these meats a lot in your country too , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . We also eat mutton .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've heard that people in your country like mutton chops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . Mutton chops taste so good . We eat them with sauce . Have you ever tried ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I tried once when I visited your country last year . I think they were very tasty . Can you cook them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly I can . I'll buy some from the butcher's and cook for you next Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . I'll bring a bottle of wine then .
segments.speaker: S2
